pConvexCylinderSettings Class Reference
[RigidBody]

Optional override to describe a convex cylinder. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • pAxisReferencedLength radius
    Radius specified by value or an objects local box size and an axis.
  • pAxisReferencedLength height
    Height specified by value or an objects local box size and an axis.
  • int approximation
    Amount of cap segments.
  • VxVector forwardAxis
    Rotation part 1. If a forward axis reference has been specified, the vector gets transformed.
  • CK_ID forwardAxisRef
    Reference to specify the "Dir" axis.
  • VxVector downAxis
    Rotation part 2. If a down axis reference has been specified, the vector gets transformed.
  • CK_ID downAxisRef
    Reference to specify the "Up" axis.
  • VxVector rightAxis
    Rotation part 3. If a right axis reference has been specified, the vector gets transformed.
  • CK_ID rightAxisRef
    Reference to specify the "Right" axis.
  • bool buildLowerHalfOnly
    Create only a half cylinder.
  • pConvexFlags convexFlags
    Flags which describe the format and behavior of a convex mesh. See pConvexFlags.

Detailed Description

Optional override to describe a convex cylinder.
